scripts.postinstall: yarn workspace @fig-node/litegraph build && yarn workspace @fig-node/core build
scripts.build: yarn workspace @fig-node/litegraph build && yarn workspace @fig-node/core build && tsc -p nodes/tsconfig.json && yarn workspace @fig-node/server build
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n litegraph,core,server,frontend -c yellow,blue,green,magenta "yarn dev:litegraph" "yarn dev:core" "yarn dev:server" "yarn dev:frontend"
